long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
PPSPY is a Shopify store spy analysis tool that helps you quickly learn about your competitors' stores and their best-selling products.
You can use ppspy to learn about shopify stores and their selling products and find your business direction and products by studying your competitors. A must have for dropshipping and e-commerce business.

- How to use PPSPY?
When visiting any shopify website, PPSPY will appear at the bottom of the page and you can start analyzing.No need to click on the top right corner of your browser.

- PPSPY FEATURES
â˜ï¸ Discover visible information about any store.
ğŸ‘Œ Free shopify store sales tracker (shopify order tracker).
â˜ï¸ Discover store traffic source channels and ad platforms including: Meta(Facebook) Ads, TikTok Ads, Pinterest Ads, Snapchat Ads.
âœŒï¸ Free shopify download and product export tool (compatible with import format).
ğŸ––The most powerful shopify theme detector and shopify app detector with tens of thousands of app rules collected.
âœ… Download and import all best-selling products and images in one click.
âœ… Discover viral reselling products through Tik-Tok ads and Facebook ads to use with Pipiads.

- Most Popular of PPSPY
âœ…  Niche Scraper: Find the best winning products to sell.
âœ…  Using ppspy for the best product research tool for dropshipping.
âœ…  Free shopify sales tracker online.

- PPSPY detail for shopify dropshipping
ğŸ¯ (1) Shop
Shop information: store name, theme, theme name, store creation time, first product time, newest product time, country&city, language, currency, product quantity, Facebook pixel, Tik Tok pixel, Best selling products, the time distribution of the latest product launches, product analysis.
 
ğŸ”(2) Products
Best selling products, Last sale product, newly added products, and product statistics.
Export shopify product and image for free.

ğŸ’° (3) Live Sales
Check out the live sales of any stores.
Sale time,sale product,sale price,last sale time,current sold products,current generated sales,order per hour,revence per hour,export and download sale&raw data.

âœŒï¸ (4) Shopify Apps and software
Detect all the shopify apps installed from any stores.

ğŸ“Š (5)Product Reviews 
Download product reviews for free.
Our review feature supports exporting reviews for these shopify apps.
You can export and download product review content with the above apps installed, or you can upload the exported content to your store.

--------

Additional Notes:
Note 1: PPSPY can be used with these apps including but not limited to: CJDropshipping, DSers, aliexpress, spocket.
Note 2: PPSPY offers all the core features of Commerce-Inspector, shine, dropship io, aliexpress hunter and much more.
It's just absolutely FREE and 10X better!

- About PPSPY
PPSPY is a Shopify spy for dropshipping & shopify sales tracker tool. It is also a professional shopify store analysis and product download tool.TikTok ads Dropshipping with Pipiads.
